DoapFiend
Package doapfiend

Package doapfiend

source code

doapfiend

http://trac.doapspace.org/doapfiend

Description

doapfiend is a command-line client and library for querying, creating and displaying DOAP (Description of a Project) RDF profiles.

doapfiend uses RDFAlchemy and rdflib to parse and serialize DOAP.

Plugins

Plugins can be written for editing DOAP, scraping websites and creating DOAP, searching for DOAP in SPARQL endpoints, displaying DOAP in various formats such as HTML etc.

Version: 0.3.2

Author: Rob Cakebread <rob@doapspace.org>

Copyright: (C) 2007-2008 Rob Cakebread

License: BSD-2

Submodules [hide private]
  • doapfiend.cli: Command-line tool for querying, serializing and displaying DOAP
  • doapfiend.doaplib: Library for parsing, displaying, querying and serializing DOAP
  • doapfiend.lexers: Lexers for semantic web languages.
  • doapfiend.model: Model of a DOAP profile using RDFAlchemy
  • doapfiend.plugins: doapfiend supports setuptools_ entry point plugins.
    • doapfiend.plugins.base: All plugins should inherit doapfiend.plugins.Plugin
    • doapfiend.plugins.fields: This plugin outputs DOAP in human-readable plain text
    • doapfiend.plugins.freshmeat: Currently this plugin uses http://doapspace.org/ to fetch DOAP for Freshmeat
    • doapfiend.plugins.homepage: Fetches DOAP by searching doapspace.org by a project's homepage.
    • doapfiend.plugins.n3: This is a plugin for formatting DOAP output as N3 (Notation 3) syntax.
    • doapfiend.plugins.ohloh: This plugin uses http://rdfohloh.wikier.org/ to fetch DOAP for projects listed on Ohlohh.
    • doapfiend.plugins.pkg_index: Plugin helper to fetch a single DOAP file from doapspace.org by Package Index
    • doapfiend.plugins.pypi: Currently this plugin uses http://doapspace.org/ to fetch DOAP for PyPI (The Python Package Index)
    • doapfiend.plugins.sourceforge: Currently this plugin uses http://doapspace.org/ to fetch DOAP for SourceForge
    • doapfiend.plugins.text: This plugin outputs DOAP in human-readable plain text
    • doapfiend.plugins.url: This plugin loads DOAP by its URL or path to a filename.
    • doapfiend.plugins.xml: This plugin outputs DOAP in RDF/XML It basically does nothing because all DOAP today is in RDF/XML.
  • doapfiend.utils: General purpose helper functions and classes for doapfiend You'll probably want to use doaplib for most cases.
